section.title: Definition
section.para: Specifies GPG keys to use for signing and verifying CentOS Studio created RPM packages. If not provided, CentOS Studio automatically generates signing keys. This element is optional.
See the CentOS Studio User Manual for more information on creating and using signing keys.

listitem.para: of a secret key, alternatively referred to as a private key, to use for signing rpm. This element is required.
of a public key to use for verifying the rpmbuild. This key is included in the published repository. This element is required.
of a passphrase associated with the secret key. This element is optional.
